main event: On 28 January 1955, in Boyinta Beach, Florida, a civilian observed a red light in the sky, changing colors and remaining stationary at an altitude of 750 to 1000 feet for approximately 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was initially observed as a red light, which then turned to whitish blue and eventually to greenish blue.
The UFO remained stationary at an altitude of 750 to 1000 feet for 15 minutes.
The document suggests that the object could have been a balloon or an astronomical phenomenon due to its stationary nature and changing colors.
The observation was made by a civilian boat captain in Boyinta Beach, Florida, between Naples and Fort Myers.
The document includes weather and wind data at the time and place of the sighting.
sighted object: Red light changing colors and remaining stationary in the sky
